description:
Kohana and friends decide to put on a play based on Sleeping Beauty at the Halloween Party. However, planning comes to a halt when all the boys insist on playing the Prince.
Amused by the situation, their stage director Chikamatsu Juri decides to hold an audition to determine who will play the Prince of Destiny.
Teika and the others take on a variety of entirely unreasonable demands.
Who will be chosen to play the Prince of Destiny and end up with the Princess?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You Are the Prince of Destiny
あなたは運命の王子様
